scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: The Distinctiones of Gerardus of Siena, including prologue and table of contents, together with Egidio Colonna, supposed author, Errores philosophorum Aristotelis Averrois Avicenne Algazelis Alkandi Rabi Moises, and the Letter of Lentulus to the Senate. Includes one illumination.
